clusters.name: Dreamlike Narratives
clusters.description: Short films exploring surreal and introspective themes, often utilizing dreamlike imagery and soundscapes.

clusters.name: Critical Commentary
clusters.description: Films examining political and social issues through satire, documentary, or narrative storytelling.

clusters.name: Visceral Transformations
clusters.description: Shorts featuring unsettling and often grotesque depictions of the human body, exploring themes of decay, transformation, and trauma.

clusters.name: Digital Surveillance
clusters.description: Films investigating the impact of technology, AI, and algorithms on human life and society.

clusters.name: Cultural Echoes
clusters.description: Shorts exploring themes of displacement, identity, and cultural collision, often featuring international settings and languages.

clusters.name: Echoes of the Past
clusters.description: Films centered around themes of memory, nostalgia, grief, and the passage of time.

clusters.name: Concrete Landscapes
clusters.description: Shorts documenting the beauty and deterioration of urban environments, exploring themes of gentrification, decay, and social change.

clusters.name: Quiet Connections
clusters.description: Films focusing on small, personal moments of connection, vulnerability, and emotion.

clusters.name: Pushing Boundaries
clusters.description: Shorts utilizing experimental techniques, styles, and narratives to challenge conventional filmmaking.

clusters.name: Sensory Explorations
clusters.description: Films prioritizing sound design, texture, and atmosphere to create immersive and evocative experiences.

clusters.name: Found Media
clusters.description: Shorts utilizing archival footage, found footage, and digital artifacts to create unsettling or poignant narratives.

clusters.name: Inner Landscapes
clusters.description: Films exploring the complexities of the human psyche, including themes of anxiety, depression, and mental illness.

clusters.name: Storytelling Experiments
clusters.description: Shorts employing non-linear narratives, fragmented storytelling, and poetic imagery to create unique cinematic experiences.

clusters.name: Movement and Form
clusters.description: Films emphasizing rhythm, movement, and visual composition to create dynamic and engaging experiences.

clusters.name: Chromatic Explorations
clusters.description: Shorts utilizing color and light as key elements of storytelling, creating mood, atmosphere, and visual impact.

clusters.name: Artisan Visions
clusters.description: Shorts featuring handcrafted elements, such as puppets, stop motion animation, and mixed-media techniques.

clusters.name: Perspective Shifts
clusters.description: Films playing with perspective, scale, and spatial relationships to create disorienting and surreal effects.

clusters.name: Elemental Forces
clusters.description: Shorts exploring the beauty and power of nature, including themes of ecology, weather, and the elements.

clusters.name: Existential Reflections
clusters.description: Films grappling with fundamental questions about human existence, identity, and purpose.

clusters.name: Critical Voices
clusters.description: Shorts offering social commentary on contemporary issues, often through satire, humor, or direct observation.

clusters.name: Future Fears
clusters.description: Shorts depicting a dystopian future dominated by technology, surveillance, and control.

clusters.name: Passionate Echoes
clusters.description: Films exploring themes of love, desire, and longing, often with a focus on emotional intensity and vulnerability.

clusters.name: Visual Poetry
clusters.description: Shorts prioritizing visual beauty, composition, and artistic expression, often with a focus on creating a specific mood or atmosphere.

clusters.name: Hidden Truths
clusters.description: Shorts exploring themes of secrets, deception, and hidden truths, often with a focus on suspense and psychological tension.

clusters.name: Echoes of Now
clusters.description: Shorts exploring the relationship between time, memory, and identity.

clusters.name: Dream Logic
clusters.description: Shorts embracing surreal and dreamlike imagery, challenging conventional narrative structures and exploring the subconscious.

clusters.name: Old Peeps
clusters.description: Shorts focusing on the lives and experiences of older generations, often exploring themes of nostalgia, regret, and wisdom.

clusters.name: Online Selves
clusters.description: Shorts exploring the impact of social media and digital identity on human relationships and self-perception.

clusters.name: Still Moments
clusters.description: Shorts utilizing slow motion to create contemplative and evocative scenes, emphasizing detail and emotion.

clusters.name: Chromatic Contrast
clusters.description: Shorts heavily utilizing the color red and blue, exploring their symbolic meanings and emotional impact.

clusters.name: Intense Yearnings
clusters.description: Shorts exploring themes of desire, obsession, and compulsion, often with a focus on psychological intensity and vulnerability.

clusters.name: Existential Dread
clusters.description: Shorts exploring themes of emptiness, despair, and the meaninglessness of existence.

clusters.name: Data Streams
clusters.description: Shorts visualizing and interpreting data streams, exploring themes of information overload, surveillance, and the impact of technology on human perception.
